book.publisher: Random House Books for Young Readers
book.synopsis: Timber! It’s off with the tuxedo and on with a red jacket when Adam Sharp goes undercover as a Mountie in Canada’s north woods. Ecanem, a mysterious logging company, is hogging Canada’s lumber business, so the Mounties call on superspy Adam Sharp to get to the bottom of things. Will this wanabee Mountie get his man—or, in this case, will he only get a moose?
book.title_long: Moose Master (Adam Sharp, Book 5) (A Stepping Stone Book)
book.dimensions: Height: 7.63 Inches, Length: 5.19 Inches, Weight: 0.17196056436 Pounds, Width: 0.14 Inches
